item.title: Opening Times
item.description: Bar Monday - Saturday 12:00 - 2:30pm 5:30 - 10:00pm Sunday 12:00 - 2:30pm Dining-In No bookings for past 8pm please. Monday - Saturday (menu) 12:00 - 2pm 5:30 - 8:30pm Sunday (menu) 12:00 - 3:00pm Takeaway All takeaways are pre-order only.
